接口 RuntimeContext<T extends org.apache.shardingsphere.underlying.common.rule.BaseRule>

  • 类型参数:
    T - type of rule
    所有超级接口:
    AutoCloseable
    所有已知实现类:

extends AutoCloseable
    Runtime context.
